game.name: Digital Defender ORC
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 음량 개별 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: In the dark cyber future of 200X, monsterkind needs YOUR help! As the Overseer of Retaliatory Combat (O.R.C. for short), you must protect monsters from digital assassins! Coordinate monster units and place obstacles & traps to stop the slaughter of the innocent in this tactical tower defense game.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In the dark cyber future of 200X, monsterkind needs YOUR help! As the Overseer of Retaliatory Combat (O.R.C. for short), you must protect monsters from digital assassins! Coordinate monster units and place obstacles & traps to stop the slaughter of the innocent in this tactical tower defense game.
